00002  *  maven Programming Language
00003  *  Created by Elliot Chance <elliot@chancemedia.com>.
00004  */
00005 
00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "strings.h"
00010 #include "files.h"
00011 
00012 bool processInstallerLine(MavenCompiler* c, string line, string packageName) {
00013         // blank lines and comments are ignored
00014         if(line == "" || line[0] == '#') return true;
00015         
00016         // get line action
00017         string action = "";
00018         for(int i = 0; i < line.length(); ++i) {
00019                 if(line[i] == ' ' || line[i] == '\t') {
00020                         break;
00021                 } else action += line[i];
00022         }
00023         
00024         // perform actions
00025         
00026         if(action == "install-import") {
00027                 // make sure the maven path exists for the package
00028                 StringList parts = split('.', line.substr(16, line.length() - 17));
00029                 
00030                 system((string(SYSTEM_MKDIR) + "\"" + combinePaths(c->binDirectory,
00031                                 c->iniFile.getKey("directories.import")) + parts.join("/", parts.length() - 2) + "\"").c_str());
00032         
00033                 StringList importParts = split('.', line.substr(16, line.length() - 17));
00034                 
00035                 // remove old files
00036                 string system = string(SYSTEM_RM) + "\"" + combinePaths(c->binDirectory,
00037                                 c->iniFile.getKey("directories.import")) + parts.join("/", parts.length() - 2) + "/" +
00038                                 importParts.join(".", importParts.length() - 2, importParts.length() - 1) + "\"";
00039                 std::system(system.c_str());
00040                 
00041                 // move files to import/
00042                 system = string(SYSTEM_CP) + "\"" + packageName + "/" + line.substr(16, line.length() - 17);
00043                 system += string("\" \"") + combinePaths(c->binDirectory, c->iniFile.getKey("directories.import")) +
00044                         parts.join("/", parts.length() - 2) + "/" + importParts.join(".", importParts.length() - 2,
00045                         importParts.length() - 1) + "\"";
00046                 std::system(system.c_str());
00047                 return true;
00048         }
00049         
00050         if(action == "install-library") {
00051                 string system = string(SYSTEM_CP) + "\"" + packageName + "/" + line.substr(17, line.length() - 18);
00052                 system += string("\" \"") + combinePaths(c->binDirectory, c->iniFile.getKey("directories.lib")) +
00053                         packageName + ".o\"";
00054                 std::system(system.c_str());
00055                 return true;
00056         }
00057         
00058         if(action == "print") {
00059                 cout << escapeString(line.substr(7, line.length() - 8));
00060                 return true;
00061         }
00062         
00063         if(action == "compile-lib-c") {
00064                 string system = "gcc -w -c ";
00065                 system += string("-I\"") + combinePaths(c->binDirectory, c->iniFile.getKey("directories.src")) +
00066                         "mavencore/\" ";
00067                 system += string("-I\"") + combinePaths(c->binDirectory, packageName) + "\" ";
00068                 StringList files = split(' ', line.substr(15, line.length() - 16));
00069                 for(int i = 0; i < files.length(); ++i)
00070                         system += "\"" + packageName + "/" + files[i] + "\" ";
00071                 system += " -o \"" + combinePaths(c->binDirectory, c->iniFile.getKey("directories.lib")) + "/";
00072                 system += removeExtension(line.substr(15, line.length() - 16)) + ".o\"";
00073                 
00074                 std::system(system.c_str());
00075                 return true;
00076         }
00077         
00078         if(action == "compile-lib-cpp") {
00079                 string system = "g++ -w -c ";
00080                 system += string("-I\"") + combinePaths(c->binDirectory, c->iniFile.getKey("directories.src")) + "mavencore/\" ";
00081                 system += string("-I\"") + combinePaths(c->binDirectory, packageName) + "\" ";
00082                 StringList files = split(' ', line.substr(17, line.length() - 18));
00083                 for(int i = 0; i < files.length(); ++i)
00084                         system += "\"" + packageName + "/" + files[i] + "\" ";
00085                 system += " -o \"" + combinePaths(c->binDirectory, c->iniFile.getKey("directories.lib")) + "/";
00086                 system += removeExtension(line.substr(17, line.length() - 18)) + ".o\"";
00087                 
00088                 std::system(system.c_str());
00089                 return true;
00090         }
00091         
00092         cout << endl << "--- Unknown install step '" << action << "'" << endl;
00093         return false;
00094 }
